name: eggd_pandora
title: eggd_pandora
summary: Takes patient and variant information and pushes into DECIPHER

inputSpec.name: api_keys
inputSpec.label: DECIPHER API keys
inputSpec.help: Link to file containing client and user keys

inputSpec.name: opencga_config
inputSpec.label: OpenCGA configuration
inputSpec.help: Link to file containing use identification

inputSpec.name: opencga_study_name
inputSpec.label: OpenCGA study where the case is located
inputSpec.help: The OpenCGA study name in the format[[user@]project:] study where study and project can be either the ID or UUID

inputSpec.name: decipher_submitter_id
inputSpec.label: DECIPHER ID of submitter
inputSpec.help: The account_id of the DECIPHER user who is the responsible for the patient record. Default is 4812, for Katherine Winfield
